tasks.title: Backup Current Project and Create Migration Branch
tasks.description: Create a complete backup of the current Nuxt2 project and establish a dedicated migration branch for the upgrade process
tasks.details:
1. Create a full backup of the current project directory
2. Commit all current changes to main branch
3. Create a new branch 'nuxt3-migration'
4. Document current project structure and dependencies
5. Take screenshots of current application functionality for comparison
tasks.testStrategy: Verify backup integrity by running the current Nuxt2 application from backup. Confirm git branch creation and clean working directory.

tasks.title: Update package.json Dependencies
tasks.description: Update Nuxt dependency to version 3 and identify compatible versions of other dependencies
tasks.details:
1. Update nuxt from ^2.x to ^3.x in package.json
2. Update @nuxt/typescript-build to @nuxt/typescript if used
3. Remove deprecated Nuxt2-specific packages
4. Update Vue to version 3 compatible version
5. Check all other dependencies for Nuxt3 compatibility
6. Update Node.js version requirement to minimum 16.10.0
tasks.testStrategy: Run npm install and verify no dependency conflicts. Check package-lock.json for correct version updates.

tasks.title: Migrate Configuration Files
tasks.description: Convert nuxt.config.js to nuxt.config.ts and update configuration syntax for Nuxt3
tasks.details:
1. Rename nuxt.config.js to nuxt.config.ts
2. Replace export default with defineNuxtConfig()
3. Update module declarations to new format
4. Convert buildModules to modules array
5. Update CSS and plugin configurations
6. Migrate any custom webpack configurations
7. Update TypeScript configuration if applicable
tasks.testStrategy: Verify configuration loads without errors using 'nuxt info' command. Test development server startup.

tasks.title: Update Project Structure and File Organization
tasks.description: Reorganize project files to match Nuxt3 directory structure and conventions
tasks.details:
1. Move static/ directory contents to public/
2. Update assets/ directory structure if needed
3. Migrate middleware files to new format
4. Update plugin file structure and registration
5. Convert store/ to composables/ if using Pinia or composables
6. Update layouts/ directory structure
7. Ensure pages/ directory follows new routing conventions
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all static assets load correctly. Test page routing and layout rendering. Confirm middleware execution.

tasks.title: Migrate Vue Components to Vue 3 Composition API
tasks.description: Update Vue components from Options API to Composition API and fix Vue 3 breaking changes
tasks.details:
1. Update component script setup syntax
2. Replace this.$refs with template refs
3. Update event handling syntax
4. Convert filters to computed properties or methods
5. Update v-model usage for custom components
6. Fix any Vue 3 breaking changes in templates
7. Update component imports and registration
tasks.testStrategy: Test each component individually for rendering and functionality. Verify event handling and data reactivity work correctly.

tasks.title: Replace vue-js-modal with Nuxt3 Compatible Alternative
tasks.description: Research and implement a Nuxt3 compatible modal solution to replace vue-js-modal
tasks.details:
1. Research available options: @kouts/vue-modal, vue-final-modal, forked vue-js-modal https://www.npmjs.com/package/@febe95/vue-js-modal, or headless UI solutions
2. Choose the most suitable replacement based on current modal usage
3. Install the chosen modal library
4. Create wrapper components to maintain existing modal API
5. Update all modal implementations throughout the application
6. Test modal functionality including programmatic opening/closing
7. Update modal styling to match current design
tasks.testStrategy: Test all modal instances for proper opening, closing, and content rendering. Verify modal backdrop behavior and keyboard navigation.

tasks.title: Update Nuxt Context Usage and API Calls
tasks.description: Replace Nuxt2 context usage with Nuxt3 composables and update API calling patterns
tasks.details:
1. Replace context.$axios with $fetch or useFetch
2. Update asyncData and fetch hooks to use new data fetching composables
3. Replace context.redirect with navigateTo
4. Update context.error with throw createError
5. Replace context.$route with useRoute
6. Update context.$router with useRouter
7. Convert process.client/server checks to process.client/server or useSSRContext
tasks.testStrategy: Test all API calls in both SSR and client-side contexts. Verify navigation and error handling work correctly.

tasks.title: Update Middleware and Plugins
tasks.description: Convert Nuxt2 middleware and plugins to Nuxt3 format and functionality
tasks.details:
1. Update middleware files to use new defineNuxtRouteMiddleware
2. Convert global middleware to new format
3. Update plugin files to use defineNuxtPlugin
4. Fix plugin injection patterns for Nuxt3
5. Update authentication middleware if present
6. Convert any custom server middleware
7. Test middleware execution order and functionality
tasks.testStrategy: Test middleware execution on protected routes. Verify plugin initialization and global availability of injected properties.

tasks.title: Update State Management and Data Flow
tasks.description: Migrate Vuex store to Pinia or composables-based state management for Nuxt3
tasks.details:
1. Install and configure Pinia if using centralized state
2. Convert Vuex modules to Pinia stores
3. Update component state access patterns
4. Migrate any server-side state hydration
5. Update authentication state management
6. Convert any store-based middleware
7. Test state persistence and reactivity
tasks.testStrategy: Test state management across page navigation. Verify SSR state hydration and client-side state updates work correctly.

tasks.title: Final Testing and Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of the migrated application and performance optimization for Nuxt3
tasks.details:
1. Run full application test suite
2. Test SSR and client-side rendering
3. Verify all routes and navigation work correctly
4. Test build process and production deployment
5. Check bundle size and performance metrics
6. Verify SEO meta tags and structured data
7. Test on multiple browsers and devices
8. Update documentation and deployment scripts
9. Performance audit using Lighthouse
10. Load testing for critical user flows
tasks.testStrategy: Execute comprehensive end-to-end testing covering all user journeys. Compare performance metrics with Nuxt2 version. Verify production build works correctly.
